title: Thank You For The Sandwiches
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Riko-san, do you have a moment?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>What’s up, Dia-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I heard that you helped Ruby make the sandwiches the other day....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eh? Fufufu, it was nothing. Ruby-chan said she wanted to make some nutritious sandwiches for you as refreshments because you seem tired. But I only taught her how to wrap them properly so that the contents won’t spill when you eat them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, Ruby was very grateful, and so am I. Thank you for doing it for Ruby and, to an extent, for me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I-, it’s really nothing much.... I feel kind of flattered.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>You truly are a kind person, Riko-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eh? Eeeeh!? Uhh, Dia-san!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Ah.... W-, what am I doing!? I just started petting you like I would Ruby.... I’m sorry....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I-, it’s fine. That.... made me happy. Umm~, could you do that for a little bit longer....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
